## Installation

You can install the released version of timewarp from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("timewarp")
```

## Notes

If you use RStudio, to match R Core syntax, I have set the `.Rproj` code editing options to:

- Uncheck "insert spaces for tabs"
- Tab width: 8
